item.title: CI/CD and Security
item.description: CI/CD Maintain a code repository Automate the build Keep the build fast Make the build self-testing Commit early, commit often Every commit to the mainline gets built Everyone can see the results of the build Automate the deployment Security Immutable artifacts CVE Scanning Least Privileged Network Isolation Run Time protection Signed Commits Signed Images
